page.title: 13Stanton Post Office
page.content: The Post Office was built in 1903, that's 82 years ago.{Mrs Mann}has run the Post Office for 25 years. She said she would live here all her life, unless she won the bingo. Her children went to Stanton School and their teacher was{Mrs Grey. There were no evacuees during the war because of the{aerodrome. Valetta Gardens was built in 1939, Bouverie Park 5 years ago, and the bungalows 15 years ago. Mrs Mann said if she could change the Post Office she would make it bigger. Mrs Mann's{hobbies}are reading and watching T.V. Mr Mann has lived here all his life and Mrs Mann has lived here for 44 years.{Mr Mann}has slept in the same room since he was little.
